title: The hidden reason for poverty the world needs to address now
description: Collective compassion has meant an overall decrease in global poverty since the 1980s, says civil rights lawyer Gary Haugen. Yet for all the world's aid money, there's a pervasive hidden problem keeping poverty alive. Haugen reveals the dark underlying cause we must recognize and act on now.
author: Gary Haugen
keywords: TED, talks, inequality, poverty, violence, justice system
